title: Integrating Cybersecurity Frameworks into IT Security: A Comprehensive Analysis of Threat Mitigation Strategies and Adaptive Technologies
summary: The cybersecurity threat landscape is constantly actively making it imperative to develop sound frameworks to protect the IT structures. Based on this introduction, this paper aims to discuss the application of cybersecurity frameworks into the IT security with focus placed on the role of such frameworks in addressing the changing nature of cybersecurity threats.
